price.note: Phased fixed price per unit in sats (Phase 1: 2100 for first 10M; Phase 2: 4200 for next 11M with AI perks); total cost computed as price_sats * qty = 210000 sats for 100 in Phase 1, paid via on-chain output to deploy's reserve_address

fees.note: Indexers require an on-chain output >= 1% of tx value to fee_address in the same tx. fee_scope='per_tx' means base fees are collected once per mint inscription transaction (not per unit). For non-exempt mint, + phased price to reserve_address minus 1% to fee_address (computed by indexer, e.g., ~2100 sats here for 100 units).

meta.reason: Public minting UNQ units via phased fixed price
